Name: episodic ataxia type 1
Definition: An episodic ataxia that is characterized by periodic ataxia and frequent myokymic discharges

Name: episodic ataxia type 2
Definition: An episodic ataxia that is characterized by periodic ataxia and nystagmus

Name: episodic ataxia type 3
Definition: An episodic ataxia that is characterized by periodic ataxia

Name: episodic ataxia type 4
Definition: An episodic ataxia that is characterized by vertigo and diplopia.

Name: episodic ataxia type 5
Definition: An episodic ataxia that is characterized by dysarthria and vertigo

Name: episodic ataxia type 6
Definition: An episodic ataxia that is characterized by nystagmus and dysarthria

Name: episodic ataxia type 7
Definition: An episodic ataxia that is characterized by episodes of weakness and dysarthria

Name: episodic ataxia type 8
Definition: An episodic ataxia that is characterized by weakness
